content.content: Friday SES Weekly Status Update Spotlight: Year End Edition!  1920×1080 204 KB   This Week’s Topic: Reflections on 2021 and the Future of MakerDAO  Join us here! on 2021-12-17T15:30:00Z  For our final status update of the year, we will reflect back on 2021. We will look at the incredible transformation that MakerDAO has gone through, from a protocol supported by the Foundation to the most advanced DAO in the industry.  MakerDAO’s journey in 2021 Our role as the SES Core Unit Lessons learned Considerations about the future  @wouter will be presenting. Add the SES Status Update Call to your calendar  Other Updates  960×540 55.9 KB   Incubator News  960×540 74.2 KB    TechOps Core Unit have their MIPs in RFC phase and have received positive feedback after their Core Unit Launch Pod session. Check it out below.  Maker Talent, also in RFC, have received a lot of feedback on their initial MIP set. To capture all the feedback, the Maker Talent team has decided to delay Formal Submission of the MIPs until the February cycle. Activities with the Bootnode Incubation Team have been put on hold due to some challenges we’ve encountered in identifying a mission, vision and strategy that works for both sides. More info will be released soon. MakerDAO SES has started the process to onboard 3 new possible core units to our incubator. This brings the total incubee count to 7 in the incubator.   Project Focus  960×540 195 KB  Big thank you from the Project X-Ray just for supporting our Web3.0 & Crypto Developer Survey. Today is the last day for survey participants to generate a Gitcoin grant R12 donation. Please help us share it with devs and/or participate if you can code: Survey link: Crypto/Web3 Developer Survey by SES MakerDAO Full details on the survey can be found on MakerDAO SES’s Twitter.  With the Community  960×540 33.9 KB    15.12 LexMaker: DAO Cooperative   Recording Live!   15.12 CULPS: TechOps   Recording Live!   19.1 CULPS: Maker Talent Forum Post Coming Soon™  Contacts  960×540 56.3 KB   Links  Discord Drive Notion   @ses-core-unit
Thanks for the update! Is there a place to see information on the Maker Academy? Sounds interesting!
Not yet. We’ll be providing more info soon. This is a pre-announcement
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Friday SES Weekly Status Update Spotlight: The Art of Core Unit Budgeting  960×540 313 KB   This Week’s Topic  Join us here! on 2021-12-10T15:30:00Z  MakerDAO SES is working to improve the Art of Core Unit Budgeting; focusing on increasing the transparency and quality control of Core Unit budgets. To date, MakerDAO SES has published our MIP Map as a first step to increasing transparency for budgets. Building on this solution, @wouter and @retro will lead a discussion showcasing the evolving SES monthly auditing process, with a preview of potential formalization and DAO-tomation across the DAO. Add the SES Status Update Call to your calendar  Other Updates  960×540 56 KB   Incubator News  960×540 52.3 KB    The proposed TechOps Core Unit has posted their MIP set. The proposals are currently in RFC, weigh in on the discussion here:  MIP39c2-SP29: Adding TechOps Core Unit (TOCU-001) MIP40c3-SP54: TechOps Core Unit MKR Budget MIP40c3-SP53: TechOps Core Unit DAI Budget MIP41c4-SP31: TechOps Core Unit Facilitator Onboarding - Simon Kelada-Polupanov MIP41c4-SP30: TechOps Core Unit Facilitator Onboarding - Dumitru Zavrotschi    The proposed Maker Talent Core Unit has posted their MIP set. The proposals are currently in RFC, weigh in on the discussion here:  MIP39c2-Sp28: Adding Maker Talent Core Unit (MT-001) MIP40c3-SP50: Modify Core Unit Budget - Maker Talent (MT-001) MIP40c3-SP51: Modify Core Unit Budget (MKR) - Maker Talent (MT-001) MIP41c4-SP29: Facilitator Onboarding for Maker Talent Core Unit (MT-001)     Project Focus  960×540 198 KB  The team from Project X-Ray just launched a big Web3.0 & Crypto Developer Survey. Please help us share it with devs and/or participate if you can code: Survey link: Crypto/Web3 Developer Survey by SES MakerDAO Project X-Ray has invested a lot of effort to make this important survey resonate within the ecosystem. Learn more about the NFT for completing the survey & Giveaway entry incentives here.  With the Community  960×540 37.6 KB    Maker Explorer: Crossing the Carbon Chasm   Recording Live!   15.12 LexMaker: DAO Cooperative  We will be hosting Miles Jennings from a16z and David Kerr from Cowrie LLC as they provide an update on their published analysis of legal frameworks for DAOs. Add to your Calendar!   15.12 CULPS: TechOps  The team from the proposed TechOps Core Unit will be presenting their mission and vision on the 22nd episode of Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions. Add to your Calendar!  Contacts  960×540 56.3 KB   Links  Discord Drive Notion   @ses-core-unit

Friday SES Weekly Status Update Spotlight : Legal Review of Governance Process  960×540 342 KB   This Week’s Topic MakerDAO SES Legal will present a review of governance processes against recently published guidance from intergovernmental bodies that create global AML standards.@layerzero will facilitate this discussion.   Join us here! Zoom Link    2021-12-03T15:30:00Z   **Add the SES Status Update Call to your calendar **   Other Updates  960×540 55.8 KB   Incubator News  960×540 55.2 KB    Maker Talent Core Unit and Tech Ops Core Unit are on track to publish their MIPs by 8.12. SES currently has 5 potential new teams for the incubator. We will start announcing new team enrollment in early 2022.   With the Community  960×540 37.6 KB    8.12 Maker Explorer: Crossing the Carbon Chasm  Adam Carver from Bitgreen joins us to shares his organization’s vision for a purpose-built blockchain to solve the world’s biggest problems: climate change, public health, wealth disparity, and others. Add to your Calendar!    15.12 LexMaker: DAO Cooperative  We will be hosting Miles Jennings from a16z and David Kerr from Cowrie LLC as they provide an update on their published analysis of legal frameworks for DAOs. Add to your Calendar!   15.12 CULPS: TechOps Forum Post Coming Soon™  Contacts  960×540 56.3 KB   Links  Discord Drive Notion   @ses-core-unit
